creator: gpage@kingsisle.com
text:
Script set up is:

Thread Group
    Simple Controller
        HTTP Request Default
        HTTP Cookie Manager
        HTTP Request - Get
        HTTP Request - Get
        HTTP Request - Post
        Listener

The thread group has 10 threads, 0 ramp up time, and 1 iteration.

Our application was modified to output the session ID for each HTTP Request.  At
the second Get threads start sharing the same session ID.

The same script run on 2.3 does not display this problem, each thread maintains
a unique session ID.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
See:

http://markmail.org/message/bis6om3wnpqtqin5

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 44042 ***

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Since you have only 1 iteration, try clearing the "Clear Cookie each 
iteration" checkbox.
